Package fr.playsoft.android.tools.customcomponents.interfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IOnGestureFlingListener
    Listener receiving call when UltraGestureDetector receives a gesture.
    IPullToUpdateListener
    Listener launched when user performs the "pull to update" action on the PullToUpdateList.
    IRefreshable
    Interface for refreshing views.
    ITouchListListener
    Listener notified about various touch events on UltraListTouch.
    IUltraActivityFragmentActionListener
    Interface which should be implemented by all FragmentActivities It enables communication Fragment -> Activity All UltraActivities should implement it! Otherwise UltraFragment will crash when added to activity
    IUltraDualViewDataProvider
    Interface for classes that provide data for the UltraDualView
    IUltraGalleryConfig
    Configuration of various UltraGalleryCells
    IUltraGalleryDataProvider
    Interface for classes that provide data for the UltraGallery
    IUltraGalleryDrawableProvider  
    IUltraGalleryOnClickListener
    Listener interface for getting on click events for UltraGallery cells.
    IUltraGridCellCheckBoxChecked
    Listener interface for clicking on CheckBox inside cells that have them.
    IUltraGridCellConfig
    Configuration of various UltraGridCells.
    IUltraGridCellImageButtonClick
    Listener interface for clicking on ImageButtons inside cells that have them.
    IUltraGridDataProvider
    Interfaces for classes that can provide data for the UltraGrid.
    IUltraGridDrawableProvider
    Interface providing custom Drawables for ultra grid cell images.
    IUltraGridFastScrollLetters
    Interface providing first letters for fast scroll.
    IUltraGridOnClickListener
    Listener interface for getting on click events for UltraGrid cells.
    IUltraListCellCheckBoxChecked
    Listener interface for clicking on CheckBox inside cells that have them.
    IUltraListCellConfig
    Configuration of various UltraListCells.
    IUltraListCellImageButtonClick
    Listener interface for clicking on ImageButtons inside cells that have them.
    IUltraListCellSwipeListener
    Listener interface for getting on click events for UltraSwipe cells.
    IUltraListDataProvider
    Interfaces for classes that can provide data for the UltraList.
    IUltraListDockedHeaderProvider
    Provides info for UltraListDocked list.
    IUltraListDrawableProvider
    Interface providing custom Drawables for ultra list cell images.
    IUltraListFastScrollLetters
    Interface providing first letters for fast scroll.
    IUltraListOnClickListener
    Listener interface for getting on click events for UltraList cells.
    IUltraListPaginationListener
    Callback interface informing that user has scrolled the list to the bottom
    IUltraMultiSwipeDataProvider
    Interfaces for classes that can provide data for the UltraMultiSwipe.
    IUltraMultiSwipeOnClickListener
    Listener interface for getting on click events for UltraMultiSwipe fragments.
    IUltraSwipeCellOnClickListener
    Listener interface for getting on click events for UltraSwipeCell fragments.
    IUltraSwipeConfig
    Configuration of various UltraSwipeCells
    IUltraSwipeDataProvider
    Interfaces for classes that can provide data for the UltraSwipe
    IUltraSwipeOnClickListener
    Listener interface for getting on click events for UltraSwipe fragments.
